node.title: Police find 'Aladdin's cave' of drugs in search for missing model Revelle Balmain
node.description: Missing model and escort Revelle Balmain's former boss has been arrested for drug and shoplifting offences, uncovered as part of an ongoing re-investigation into her disappearance.Â
node.content:
["Missing model and escort Revelle Balmain's former boss has been charged with\u00a0drug and shoplifting offences, uncovered as part of an ongoing reinvestigation into her disappearance.", "The 22-year-old was last seen in the Kingsford area in Sydney's eastern suburbs in 1994.\u00a0", "Her property, including a make-up bag, keys and a shoe were later found scattered on a Kingsford street.\u00a0", "A coronial inquest in 1999 found that she had been killed.", "The case is being reinvestigated, with searches taking place this week at properties in Bellevue Hill, Bondi Beach and Potts Point.\u00a0", "Detective Chief Inspector Stuart Bell said during the new probe, police uncovered an alleged organised Serbian criminal syndicate.", "\"In recanvassing the investigation, we were looking at a person of interest and the alleged offences were detected during that investigation,\" he said.\u00a0", "", "
Four search warrants were executed yesterday morning.(Supplied: NSW)
", "Police arrested a 63-year-old, who used to run the escort agency Balmain worked for, and four others.\u00a0", "Authorities\u00a0alleged they were cultivating and supplying drugs, as well as stealing and selling luxury goods.\u00a0", "Warrants executed yesterday in Sydney's eastern suburbs led police to seize $400,000 worth of cannabis, and $150,000 worth of suspected stolen luxury goods.\u00a0", "Police said the \"Aladdin's cave\"\u00a0was found with designer handbags, clothing, shoes, watches and high-end alcohol in it.\u00a0", "\"[These alleged]\u00a0offences are current offences, nothing linked with Revelle Balmain,\" Detective Chief Inspector Bell said.", "\"Five people are in custody, four of those have no connections with Revelle Balmain whatsoever.\"", "\"That person was in the initial coronial investigation and as part of the coroner's matter we're recanvassing all interviews and witness statements.\"", "\"Everyone that was in the original investigation is still a person of interest in this matter, and we continue to conduct our investigation in trying to find answers for the victim's family.\"", "Asked about this week's searches, Detective Chief Inspector Bell said the forensic search was ongoing and the \"results won't be known for some time\".", "The men, aged between 50 and 65, were refused bail and will face Central Local Court today.\u00a0"]
